title: eSIM not usable after update Android 9
content:
eSIM was usable (setting > mobile network > carrier > add carrier > add esim by QR) everything is working fine and very happy with the esim service.

however, nightmare after update android 9
1. esim became not usable
2. factory reset (esim reset is checked)
3. setup the phone and realized carrier setting is unavailable (setting > mobile network)
4. hard reset
5. still no carrier setting. so basically i cant add new carrier

it seem android 9 locked/removed esim feature from this device.

how can i turn back on "carrier setting" on this phone to do QR scan ?
category: Connectivity, Network, Bluetooth, Google Pixel 3 XL
